title: MVP-2: calibration + BEV (quality-gated) + running stats

runbooks.notes: No runbook changes required for this intent.

summary: Add one-time calibration (auto-first with manual fallback) for a static single camera.
Enable BEV outputs and meters-based stats only when calibration quality passes deterministic gates.
non_goals: Fisheye/undistortion perfection in MVP (defer; do not emit wrong meters).
success_criteria: Calibration outputs real diagnostics (not placeholders) and produces a deterministic gate decision.
When calibration passes, BEV tracks + bev.mp4 are produced; when it fails, BEV is disabled with explicit reasons.
Distance/speed/heatmaps are computed only when BEV is gated-on and are excluded otherwise.

work_packages.title: Calibration
items: TASK-CAL-AUTO-MVP-001 Implement auto-first calibration flow and emit metrics.
TASK-CAL-MANUAL-CLICK-MVP-001 Implement a minimal manual click fallback and persisted artifact.

work_packages.title: BEV + stats
items: TASK-BEV-GATE-DIAGNOSTICS-MVP-001 Implement deterministic gating and diagnostic reasons.
TASK-BEV-RENDER-MVP-001 Render bev.mp4 when gated-on and ensure outputs are deterministic.
TASK-STATS-METERS-MVP-001 Compute meters-based stats only when gated-on.
